about_the_game: Strap yourself into the cockpit of the world's most elite fighting weapon! It's the F-117A Stealth Fighter. And once you fly it, you'll see why no other flight simulator compares! Incredible 3-D graphics will keep you glued to your screen as you experience the same intense pressures that gripped America's Gulf War pilots. Penetrate enemy airspace without being seen! Tangle with the enemy in treacherous dogfights! Launch awesome firepower against fierce opponents! Your wait is over. The ultimate weapon has arrived. Now it's your turn to pilot the real Stealth Fighter!
detailed_description: Strap yourself into the cockpit of the world's most elite fighting weapon! It's the F-117A Stealth Fighter. And once you fly it, you'll see why no other flight simulator compares! Incredible 3-D graphics will keep you glued to your screen as you experience the same intense pressures that gripped America's Gulf War pilots. Penetrate enemy airspace without being seen! Tangle with the enemy in treacherous dogfights! Launch awesome firepower against fierce opponents! Your wait is over. The ultimate weapon has arrived. Now it's your turn to pilot the real Stealth Fighter!

name: F-117A Stealth Fighter (NES edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 550 3.2GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670, ATI Radeon™ R9 280 or Intel HD 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 11 or better)
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7, 8, 8.1) or Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows® 10)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS®7, 8, 8.1, 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3570 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 11 or better)
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7, 8, 8.1) or Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows® 10)

short_description: Strap yourself into the cockpit of the world's most elite fighting weapon!
